tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE learning_paths (
    path_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT,
    preferences JSONB,
    interests JSONB,
    learning_style VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE personalized_learning_paths (
    student_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    preferences JSONB,
    interests JSONB,
    learning_styles JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE preferences (
    preference_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    preference_name TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE interests (
    interest_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    interest_name TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE learning_styles (
    style_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    style_name TEXT,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Students (
  student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  learning_style VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Courses (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  instructor VARCHAR(50),
  duration_hours INT
);

CREATE TABLE Preferences (
  preference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  course_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);
